cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 3 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

privates.name: Basic Single Private Ensuite
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: Less is more. Our compact and functional Good room comes with a single 2-metre long bed, a 43" smart TV, a vanity and hidden storage to maximize space. Ideal for students who want a budget-friendly living solution.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 7 nights stay on your dates

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

privates.name: Basic Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Providing additional space, our comfortable and fully equipped Great studio offers a double or a queen bed. The perfect option for solo dwellers who thrive on privacy and independence

privates.labelDescription: Extra roomy and practical, our Greater studio is fully furnished with everything you might need, from an extended wardrobe to a spacious L-shaped working desk big enough for 2. We provide all the essentials and you make it home.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 22:59 4th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 22:59 4th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
